comments.text:
The steps to reproduce are there for you to describe step by step how you someone can reproduce the problem.

What is the "merrill lynch website"  and where are the "continue buttons" ?
comments.raw_text:
The steps to reproduce are there for you to describe step by step how you someone can reproduce the problem.

What is the "merrill lynch website"  and where are the "continue buttons" ?

the website is https://olui2.fs.ml.com/Login/Login.aspx?SITESRC=MLD

at the log on page it asks for user id ---this can be entered
below the user id, grayed out is a "continue" button. nothing can be entered here.
also, there are a number of links on the page such as "need help logging in".
these also are not active

i do not have this problem on internet explorer, just with firefox.

thank you
